responses: Hello! How can I assist you with college admissions today?

patterns: What is the cutoff for CSE?

responses: Cutoffs vary by college, category, and year. You can use our ML predictor for personalized cutoff estimates.

patterns: Can I get into a good college?

responses: Our AI probability calculator can estimate your chances. Please share your rank, category, and preferred course.

Reservation categories (OC, BC, MBC, SC, ST) significantly affect cutoffs. Lower categories often have lower cutoff ranks. Our predictor accounts for this.
You can view cutoff trends using our trends endpoint. It shows how cutoffs for a college and course varied over the years.

patterns: What are safe colleges for me?
responses: Based on your rank, we can categorize colleges into Safe (high chance), Target (moderate), and Dream (ambitious). Use our probability endpoint for each college.
